Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Pain. Pain. Pain...'}
{3: 'For Vera, pain is what makes life, life.'}
{3: '—But there is no pain to be found here. To the uninitiated, the quietude of this place might even hint at inner peace.'}
{3: '——Which, to Vera, is purgatory—is limbo.'}
{3: 'In purgatory, the past revives, echoes, replays...'}
{3: '—And so, Vera lives through the pain and joy of battle.'}
{3: 'This is why Vera seeks the battlefield—'}
{3: 'Dancing on the tightrope between life and death, capering in the euphoria of adrena-sim shots flowing in her vital fluids.'}
{3: 'Here, Vera finds her peace. Here, Vera lives until her demise.'}
{3: '——As such, the imminent quietude drives Vera distraught.'}
{3: 'To the point where it even reminds her of the conversation with Commander Nikola before she landed in this place.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Cerberus reporting.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Vera waltzed into Nikola's office and slapped a copy of the mission directive on Nicola's desk."}
{3: "The scattered stack of papers and holo-tapes caused Nikola's old-world mementos to flop off the desk and tumble onto the floor."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Care for a kind explanation, Commander Nikola?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Cerberus—known for assault and decap strikes—on some silly recon mission in this "water park" thing?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'I have no obligations to explain why I assigned you this mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If you don't tell me what you're looking for, I can't guarantee that you'll get what you want.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'And, please don\'t forget—I\'m only obeying your commands because of your little promise of "giving me pain and suffering enough to drown it all out."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'So, I need an explanation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "You'll thank me for going on this mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That's not an explanation.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "...There is something you'd want in this mission, which is why I assigned it to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'And of all the hounds I can deploy, only you are capable of perfectly accomplishing my orders.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...You're trying something?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Track down a person called Shome. I'll tell you when it's time to act.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That's still hardly an explanation.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You can expect an explanation all you want, but I am not obligated to answer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "All I can say is that if you're looking for battle, you'll find it there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Very well. Then I guess I'll have a gander at what you've packed in your mystery box.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With that, Vera turned and left.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory185.png'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Heyas! We finished getting the boom-booms in place!'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Give a call and we'll blow this place to pieces."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Noctis, you suck at shutting up.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I'm just do-ing mah job here."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Just shut up if you don't want to become a slab of wetware.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Noctis, how are the little birdies doing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "That stinky Roland messed their pace up a lil', then Kamui fell, but now they seem to have found themselves some new helpers."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Anyway, now they've split up. One new guy went underground and the others went inside the park."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Underground? You mean that...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Yep. Deader than dead kinda dead zone. My eyeballs still be workin' fine. He just strutted in there, man."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "So, whaddya say? Should I go give him a sniff? Guy does feel a lil' familiar..."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "No, that won't be necessary. He'll regroup with the others sooner or later.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's begin.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{3: 'After Vera left, Nikola silently gathered up the things Vera slapped onto the floor, placing them back onto the table.'}
{3: "Then, he linked to Babylonia's internal channel."}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'She agreed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'No, this is also part of the plan.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I don't care about what you think. This is part of the plan.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'I remember what we did, very clearly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You can skip the part of saying we made the right choices.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '...This is all to retake Earth.', 4: '1'}
